content: this is a summary of a legal text regarding a court decision made by the district court in ljubljana the court case involved the inheritance of a deceased persons assets including real estate bank accounts shares in a company and unpaid pension benefits the court determined that the estate would be divided between the widower and daughter of the deceased with the daughter receiving a 12 share the specific assets that each heir will receive were outlined in an inheritance agreement the court process started on january 11 2021 and ended on january 24 2022 lasting for 1 year and 14 days the court fee for the case was 702 euros which was paid by the heirs the court reminded the heirs to obtain a certificate of finality of the succession order and arrange for the transcription of movable property the text also provided instructions for lodging an appeal which must be submitted within 15 days from the date of receiving the written decision the appeal should be filed with the appropriate court and include specific details and grounds for the appeal the ljubljana high court will determine the outcome of the appeal
